characters.name: Tir McDohl
characters.notes: Joins automatically at the beginning of the story.

characters.name: Cleo
characters.notes: Joins automatically before receiving your first mission from Kraze.

characters.name: Gremio
characters.notes: Joins automatically before receiving your first mission from Kraze.

characters.name: Ted
characters.notes: Joins automatically before receiving your first mission from Kraze.

characters.name: Viktor
characters.notes: Joins automatically before escaping Gregminster.

characters.name: Odessa Silverberg
characters.notes: Joins automatically on your mission to Sarady.

characters.name: Mathiu Silverberg
characters.notes: Joins automatically after Tir agrees to become leader of the resistance.

characters.name: Camille
characters.notes: Joins automatically after meeting Tai Ho.

characters.name: Tai Ho
characters.notes: Joins automatically at the Toran Lake Fortress.

characters.name: Luc
characters.notes: Joins automatically after taking the Toran Lake Fortress.

characters.name: Yam Koo
characters.notes: Joins automatically after taking the Toran Lake Fortress.

characters.name: Chandler
characters.notes: Speak to him at the Fortress of Kwaba after taking the Toran Lake Fortress.

characters.name: Kai
characters.notes: Speak to him at the Garan Fortress after taking the Toran Lake Fortress.

characters.name: Lorelai
characters.notes: Speak to her in the Inn at Kouan after taking the Toran Lake Fortress. Tir must be at least lv. 25.

characters.name: Maas
characters.notes: Speak to him in the blacksmith at Great Forest Village after taking the Toran Lake Fortress.

characters.name: Marie
characters.notes: Speak to her in the Inn at Seika after taking the Toran Lake Fortress.

characters.name: Onil
characters.notes: Speak to her in her house at Seika after taking the Toran Lake Fortress.

characters.name: Sansuke
characters.notes: Speak to him in his house at Great Forest Village after taking the Toran Lake Fortress.

characters.name: Sergei
characters.notes: Speak to him in the Tavern at Kaku after taking the Toran Lake Fortress.

characters.name: Antonio
characters.notes: Speak to him in the Inn at Seika anytime after recruitng Marie. Marie must have mentioned needing help with cooking. Repeatedly talk to her at the Inn at HQ until she does (you just talk to her a few times while choosing Don't Stay).

characters.name: Rock
characters.notes: Speak to him in the Vault in Lepant's mansion. Allow him to join.

characters.name: Juppo
characters.notes: Joins you automatically whether or not you speak with him.

characters.name: Meg
characters.notes: Speak to her outside the Inn at Kaku with Juppo in your active party.

characters.name: Eileen
characters.notes: Joins automatically after saving her from Kraze.

characters.name: Giovanni
characters.notes: Joins automatically after saving Eileen from Kraze.

characters.name: Krin
characters.notes: Joins automatically after saving Eileen from Kraze.

characters.name: Lepant
characters.notes: Joins automatically after saving Eileen from Kraze.

characters.name: Pahn
characters.notes: Speak to him in Kraze's Mansion after saving Eileen. Spoiler: After conquering Scarleticia Castle, Pahn needs to survive an important duel. If he is around level 30, has a level 10+ weapon, and is equipped with the best armor available, he can easily win. If he doesn't, he dies.

characters.name: Gaspar
characters.notes: Speak to him in the tavern at Kaku with a level 2 castle. Win 5000 bits from him.

characters.name: Sydonia
characters.notes: Joins automatically after saving Eileen from Kraze.

characters.name: Varkas
characters.notes: Joins automatically after saving Eileen from Kraze.

characters.name: Kirkis
characters.notes: Joins automatically after agreeing to help him fight Kwanda Rossman's army.

characters.name: Sheena
characters.notes: Speak to him in the Inn at Seika with Lepant in your active party. Castle Level 2

characters.name: Viki
characters.notes: Allow her to join the army when you meet her in the Great Forest.

characters.name: Meese
characters.notes: Speak to him in the blacksmith at the Village of the Dwarves. Maas must be recruited.

characters.name: Valeria
characters.notes: Joins automatically before going to the Village of the Dwarves.

characters.name: Templeton
characters.notes: Speak to him at the Village of the Elves after it is destroyed.

characters.name: Kuromimi
characters.notes: Joins automatically before the major battle with Kwanda Rossman.

characters.name: Sanchez
characters.notes: Joins automatically before the major battle with Kwanda Rossman.

characters.name: Humphrey Mintz
characters.notes: Joins automatically before the major battle with Kwanda Rossman.

characters.name: Kwanda Rosman
characters.notes: After defeating him, mention that there is something wrong with him. Choose to recruit him. Note: Do not agree to execute him at any time.

characters.name: Stallion
characters.notes: Joins automatically after defeating Kwanda Rosman.

characters.name: Sylvina
characters.notes: Joins automatically after defeating Kwanda Rosman.

characters.name: Fu Su Lu
characters.notes: Speak to him in the Inn at the Kobold Village. Pay 10,000 bits for the food he has eaten.

characters.name: Gon
characters.notes: Speak to him in his house at Kobold Village with Kuromimi in the active party.

characters.name: Rubi
characters.notes: Speak to him in the Inn at Kobold Village with Kirkis in your party. Kirkis must be at least Level 35.

characters.name: Apple
characters.notes: Speak to her in Mathiu's house at Seika after defeating Kwanda Rosman. Tell her that Mathiu wanted to help you. Castle Level 2

characters.name: Flik
characters.notes: After he storms out of the HQ, follow him to Kaku. He will agree to join forces with you.

characters.name: Chapman
characters.notes: Speak to him in the Armor Shop at Antei. Allow him to join you. He won't ask unless your Castle is at least Level 2.

characters.name: Eikei
characters.notes: Speak to him at Teien with Tir at Level 40 or higher and Castle Level 2 or higher.

characters.name: Hellion
characters.notes: Speak to her in the Inn/Item Shop at Teien. Allow her to join you. She won't ask unless your Castle is at least Level 2.

characters.name: Jabba
characters.notes: Speak to him in the Appraisal Shop at Rikon with a Nameless Urn in your inventory.

characters.name: Jeane
characters.notes: Speak to her in the Rune Shop at Antei. Allow her to join you. If your Castle is not large enough she will tell you to get more recruits. Castle Level 3

characters.name: Lotte
characters.notes: Speak to her in the Inn at Rikon. Agree to find her cat. Go to Kaku and capture the cat just outside the Inn. Return it to her. She will not ask for your help unless your Castle level is high enough. Castle Level 3
